```lean
def p_n (n : ℕ) : ℚ :=
  let s := finset.univ.filter (λ (c : ℕ × ℕ), (c.fst + c.snd).is_square) in
  s.card / (n * n)

theorem probability_perfect_square_sum (n : ℕ) :
  p_n n = ↑(finset.univ.filter (λ c : ℕ × ℕ, (c.fst + c.snd).is_square)).card / (n * n) :=
rfl
```

```lean
def p_n (n : ℕ) : ℚ :=
  let sqs := Finset.image (λ x, x * x) (Finset.range (2 * n).succ) in
  let count := Finset.card (Finset.filter (λ x, ∃ c d, c + d = x ∧ c ∈ Finset.range n.succ ∧ d ∈ Finset.range n.succ) sqs) in
  count / (n * n)
```

def p_n (n : ℕ) : ℚ :=
  (Finset.univ.filter (λ c, Finset.univ.filter (λ d, is_square (c + d))).nonempty).card / n^2
